about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the world of the future. Where corporations build themselves entire cities to realize their devious plans. The story is about a boy who grew up under the wing of a powerful corporation. However, one day there was an incident that changed his whole life.



The game will feature chips for immersion in the world of virtual reality. Where your desires are not limited to the cyberpunk setting. Pirates, knights, mages, demons, and maybe many other things.



Code of Desire - it's an erotic visual novel for adults. So there are some things you can't do without:

▲ Lots of erotic scenes
▲ Animated sex scenes
▲ Mini games

Choose who you will become. A great lover, a secret agent, a harem lord, and more. Or you will be consumed by evil.

content_descriptors.notes: Code of Desire - it's an erotic visual novel for adults. Mature content actually present in the game or planned for the future. Foul language, blowjob and genitalia, sex, group sex, lesbians, forced sex, unprovoked sex.

detailed_description:
Join our Discord channel


About the Game



Immerse yourself in the world of the future. Where corporations build themselves entire cities to realize their devious plans. The story is about a boy who grew up under the wing of a powerful corporation. However, one day there was an incident that changed his whole life.



The game will feature chips for immersion in the world of virtual reality. Where your desires are not limited to the cyberpunk setting. Pirates, knights, mages, demons, and maybe many other things.



Code of Desire - it's an erotic visual novel for adults. So there are some things you can't do without:

name: Code of Desire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0-capable graphics card/integrated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Newer
  • Processor: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0-capable graphics card/integrated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 8.0

short_description: Erotic Science Fiction Visual Novel. Explore the secrets of a corporation that specializes in neural chips in the company of lovely companions.
